Text:
Loser, don't bother reading thanks just a vent post

This isn't for comments, upvotes, or even really to be read. I just wanted to put it out there. I am a terrible, monster, loser person. I suck at life, I suck at my marriage, and I took a job that I love but has caused nothing but problems. I'm not selfish to kill myself or simply run away because I have responsibility to the house I'm in and debt I won't leave my spouse. I f up from the time I get until bed and I f that up to because I snore and I'm overweight and take up too much space. Once again I f uped so much my spouse is not speaking to me and I just want to run. I don't want to leave a mess but damn how simple it would be to just not exist and stop being an f ing monster.
